Class ConvertedTypeBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.tools.observer.impl.BaseWeakReferencingObservable
      • org.gvsig.raster.lib.buffer.impl.AbstractBuffer

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Band>, Buffer, StatisticsCapable, Disposable, ComplexObservable, ComplexWeakReferencingObservable, Observable, Observer, WeakReferencingObservable

    public class ConvertedTypeBuffer
extends AbstractBuffer
implements Buffer
    This is like a view over a raster buffer. It's for rendering purposes only.
